Are you sure you want to delete this ite: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
Block UID is already set and cannot be m: Block UID is already set and cannot be modified
Some configurations using uid may need t: Some configurations using uid may need to be reconfigured
Template is in use and cannot be deleted: Template is in use and cannot be deleted
Using reference fields will remove exist: Using reference fields will remove existing fields.
This block already references field temp: This block already references a field template. Please convert fields to duplicate first.
Convert reference to duplicate is unavai: Convert reference to duplicate is unavailable
Are you sure to convert this template bl: Are you sure to convert this template block to duplicate mode?
Are you sure to convert referenced field: Are you sure to convert referenced fields to duplicate mode?
Template collection mismatch: Collection mismatch: requires "{{expected}}", but template is for "{{actual}}"
Template data source mismatch: Data source mismatch: requires "{{expected}}", but template is for "{{actual}}"
Template association mismatch: Association mismatch: requires "{{expected}}", but template is for "{{actual}}"
Replace current block with reference tem: Replace current block with reference template
Replace current popup with reference tem: Replace current popup with reference template
Are you sure to convert this pop-up to c: Are you sure to convert this pop-up to duplicate mode?
This pop-up is not using a popup templat: This pop-up is not using a popup template
Only Popup can be saved as popup templat: Only Popup can be saved as popup template
Failed to copy popup from template: Failed to duplicate popup from template
Template field section description: The field section of the specified block template will be used
Reference mode description: Modifying the block will update all places that reference this template.
Duplicate mode description: Generates new content based on the template. All UIDs (including child node UIDs) will be regenerated. Cross-block UID references will no longer work after duplication.
Convert current block to template descri: The current block itself will become a template reference
Duplicate current block as template desc: Keep original block, create a copy as template
Convert current popup to template descri: The current popup itself will become a template reference
Duplicate current popup as template desc: Keep original popup, create a copy as template
